articles.title: Covid-hit homeowners fear getting stuck on costly mortgage deal - The Guardian
articles.description: Brokers say borrowers with reduced incomes should not assume they must move to standard variable rate
articles.content: A third of borrowers who have seen their income fall as a result of the pandemic fear they may not be able to remortgage, research has found but brokers say they shouldnt just assume they have to mov… [+4206 chars]
